ssh.response:
VRF Name                 RD               Interfaces
CUSTOMER-A               65001:100        GigabitEthernet1.100
MGMT                     65001:999        GigabitEthernet2.0
INTERNET                 65001:200        GigabitEthernet1.200

VRF CUSTOMER-A
  Route Distinguisher: 65001:100
  Description: Customer A VPN
  Interfaces:
    GigabitEthernet1.100       up
  Import Route Target:
    65001:100
  Export Route Target:
    65001:100
  Maximum Routes: not set

VRF MGMT
  Route Distinguisher: 65001:999
  Description: Management VRF
  Interfaces:
    GigabitEthernet2.0         up
  Import Route Target:
    65001:999
  Export Route Target:
    65001:999
  Maximum Routes: not set

VRF INTERNET
  Route Distinguisher: 65001:200
  Description: Internet Gateway VRF
  Interfaces:
    GigabitEthernet1.200       up
  Import Route Target:
    65001:200
  Export Route Target:
    65001:200
  Maximum Routes: not set
